Description:
Job Details:Role: Mobile & Fixed System EngineerContract: 12 months & extendableWork Location: Dubai, United Arab EmiratesSalary & Benefits: (Negotiable based on the expertise)Job Responsibilities:Key Responsibilities:Responsible for deployment and field operation reports communication for respect to defined programs, tracks and management tasks.
Responsible for data and systems managing deployment and field operation data.
Responsible for managing section performance consolidation , analysis and reports generations.
Responsible for managing repository for data records and reports.Skills
Skills: Start Date: Immediate joiners to 30 Days of Notice period
Important Note: Need candidates to be inside the country

Knowledge of Mobile and Fixed systems nodes
Statistical and operational reporting and analysis.
Data Science and Data Processing Knowledge
Project management skills
Knowledge of Etisalat network and Infrastructure
Knowledge of Etisalat Products and Services

Presentation & Soft Skills

Bachelor’s Degree in engineering / Telecommunications / Electrical Engineering or equivalent.

5-8 years of experience in Technology Department under Telecom Vendor/Operator.
